add_items.title: Add Items
add_items.description: Loot table with items to add to the player's inventory upon successful interaction.

table.description: File path, relative to the Behavior Pack's path, to the loot table file.
table.title: Table

cooldown.title: Cooldown
cooldown.description: Time in seconds before this entity can be interacted with again.

admire.title: Admire
admire.description: Allows entity to admire the item. Requires "minecraft:admire_item" and "minecraft:behavior.admire_item" to work.

barter.title: Barter
barter.description: Allows entity to barter with the item. Requires "minecraft:barter" to work.

cooldown_after_being_attacked.title: Cooldown After Being Attacked
cooldown_after_being_attacked.description: Time in seconds before this entity can be interacted with after being attacked.

health_amount.title: Health Amount
health_amount.description: The amount of health this entity will recover or hurt when interacting with this item. Negative values will harm the entity.

hurt_item.title: Hurt Item
hurt_item.description: The amount of damage the item will take when used to interact with this entity. A value of 0 means the item won't lose durability.

interact_text.title: Interact Text
interact_text.description: Text to show when the player is able to interact in this way with this entity when playing with Touch-screen controls.

on_interact.title: On Interact
on_interact.description: Event to fire when the interaction occurs.

particle_on_start.title: Particle On Start
particle_on_start.description: Particle effect that will be triggered at the start of the interaction.

particle_offset_towards_interactor.description: Whether or not the particle will appear closer to who performed the interaction.
particle_offset_towards_interactor.title: Particle Offset Towards Interactor

particle_type.description: The type of particle that will be spawned.
particle_type.title: Particle Type

particle_y_offset.description: Will offset the particle this amount in the y direction.
particle_y_offset.title: Particle Y Offset

play_sounds.title: Play Sounds
play_sounds.description: List of sounds to play when the interaction occurs.

spawn_entities.title: Spawn Entities
spawn_entities.description: List of entities to spawn when the interaction occurs.

spawn_items.description: Loot table with items to drop on the ground upon successful interaction.
spawn_items.title: Spawn Items

table.description: File path, relative to the Behavior Pack's path, to the loot table file.
table.title: Table

swing.title: Swing
swing.description: If true, the player will do the "swing" animation when interacting with this entity.

transform_to_item.title: Transform To Item
transform_to_item.description: The feed item used will transform to this item upon successful interaction. Format: itemName:auxValue

use_item.title: Use Item
use_item.description: If true, the interaction will use an item.

vibration.title: Vibration
vibration.description: Vibration to emit when the interaction occurs. Admitted values are none (no vibration emitted), shear, entity_die, entity_act, entity_interact.

give_item.title: Give Item
give_item.description: UNDOCUMENTED Item to give to the player upon successful interaction.

take_item.title: Take Item
take_item.description: UNDOCUMENTED Takes an item from the player.

drop_item_slot.title: Drop Item Slot
drop_item_slot.description: The entity's equipment slot to remove and drop the item from, if any, upon successful interaction.

drop_item_y_offset.title: Drop Item Y Offset
drop_item_y_offset.description: Will offset the item drop position this amount in the y direction. Requires "drop_item_slot" to be specified.

equip_item_slot.title: Equip Item Slot
equip_item_slot.description: The entity's equipment slot to equip the item to, if any, upon successful interaction.

repair_entity_item.title: Repair Entity Item
repair_entity_item.description: Allows to repair one of the entity's items.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: How much of the item durability should be restored upon interaction.

slot.title: Slot
slot.description: The entity's slot containing the item to be repaired.
